name: E-Commerce Platform Redesign
description: Complete overhaul of the legacy e-commerce platform to improve conversion rates and mobile responsiveness. Includes migration to a headless CMS architecture.

name: Mobile Banking App - iOS
description: Native iOS application development for secure banking transactions. Currently paused pending security compliance review.

name: Corporate Intranet Portal
description: Internal communication hub for employees, featuring document management, news feed, and HR integrations.

name: AI-Powered Analytics Dashboard
description: Real-time data visualization dashboard integrating machine learning models for predictive analytics.

name: Healthcare Patient Management System Migration
description: Large-scale migration of patient records to a cloud-based HIPAA-compliant system. Critical focus on data integrity and security.

name: Marketing Campaign Landing Pages
description: High-speed, SEO-optimized landing pages for Q1 marketing campaigns. Built with Next.js for performance.

name: Supply Chain Tracking API
description: RESTful API development for tracking shipment status across multiple carriers in real-time.

name: Educational Learning Management System (LMS)
description: Platform for online courses, student progress tracking, and automated grading. Paused for curriculum restructuring.

name: Smart Home IoT Controller Firmware
description: Embedded firmware development for the next-generation smart home hub. Focus on low-latency communication with Zigbee devices.

name: Legacy CRM Database Cleanup
description: Data sanitation and deduplication project for a 10-year-old CRM database. successfully improved query performance by 40%.

name: Virtual Reality Showroom Experience
description: Immersive VR experience for customers to visualize furniture in their homes. WebXR based implementation.

name: Blockchain Identity Verification Prototype
description: Decentralized identity proof-of-concept using Ethereum. Awaiting regulatory clarity before proceeding to production.
